meanings.definition: Emitting light when exposed to radiation
meanings.sent1: The room was bright with fluorescent colors under the blacklight.
meanings.sent2: The fluorescent stars on the ceiling glowed softly in the dark.
meanings.sent3: The fluorescent paint on the walls made the room look like a magical forest.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant and fluorescent as a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The fluorescent glow of the fireflies lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: A type of light bulb that emits light when electricity passes through it
meanings.sent1: The office installed new fluorescents to save energy.
meanings.sent2: The fluorescents in the classroom flickered before finally turning on.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to chase the fluorescents' reflections on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were lined with fluorescents, creating a path of light.
meanings.sent5: The fluorescents hummed softly, casting a gentle glow over the room.
